hero.heading: I am
hero.details: A passionate Web Developer specializing in modern web technologies, equipped with a diverse and promising skill set, to bring innovative ideas to life on the web.

about.title: About me
about.description: I discovered my passion for coding in my first year of university, driving me to continually improve my web development skills and stay current with industry trends. With a Computer Science degree and certifications in Full Stack Web Development and Project Management, I blend technical expertise with strategic insight.

frontend.title: Frontend developer
frontend.description: I specialize in front-end development, with a good understanding of SSR, SSG that Next js introduces and a solid knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React...

backend.title: Backend developer
backend.description: I have a solid understanding of back-end technologies and Databases like Node.js, Django and Django Rest Framework for building powerfull APIs..

cards.description: A web application for managing all kinds of university resources like materials, students, classes, and the main feature is managing timetables to synchronize teachers with classrooms and modules.
A SaaS Website Builder for building simple applications with drag and drop, project Management features with a great dashboard
